Package gw.api.util.stats

Class StatisticsCollector<S,T extends Number>

java.lang.Object
gw.api.util.stats.StatisticsCollector<S,T>
Type Parameters:
S - type of data
T - type of statistics
public class StatisticsCollector<S,T extends Number> extends Object
Thread-safe statistics collection utility.
